verses.verse: And Miryam <S%H4813><s%> and Aharon <S%H175><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> against Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> because of <S%H182><s%> the Ethiopian <S%H3571><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> whom he had married <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: for he had married <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> an Ethiopian <S%H3571><s%> woman <S%H802><s%>.

And they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Hath the YY <S%H3068><s%> indeed spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> only by Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>? hath he not spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> also by us? And the YY <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it.

(Now the man <S%H376><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> meek <S%H6035><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H6035><s%>, above all the men <S%H120><s%> which were upon the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>.)

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> suddenly <S%H6597><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, and unto Aharon <S%H175><s%>, and unto Miryam <S%H4813><s%>, Come out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye three <S%H7969><s%> unto the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>. And they three <S%H7969><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of the cloud <S%H6051><s%>, and stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>, and called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Aharon <S%H175><s%> and Miryam <S%H4813><s%>: and they both <S%H8147><s%> came forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> now my words <S%H1697><s%>: If there be a prophet <S%H5030><s%> among you, I the YY <S%H3068><s%> will make myself known <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8691><s%> unto him in a vision <S%H4759><s%>, and will speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto him in a dream <S%H2472><s%>.
My servant <S%H5650><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> is not so, who is faithful <S%H539><s%> <S%H8737><s%> in all mine house <S%H1004><s%>.

With him will I speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%> to mouth <S%H6310><s%>, even apparently <S%H4758><s%>, and not in dark speeches <S%H2420><s%>; and the similitude <S%H8544><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> shall he behold <S%H5027><s%> <S%H8686><s%>: wherefore then were ye not afraid <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> against my servant <S%H5650><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> ?
And the anger <S%H639><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against them; and he departed <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And the cloud <S%H6051><s%> departed <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from off the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>; and, behold, Miryam <S%H4813><s%> became leprous <S%H6879><s%> <S%H8794><s%>, white as snow <S%H7950><s%>: and Aharon <S%H175><s%> looked <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon Miryam <S%H4813><s%>, and, behold, she was leprous <S%H6879><s%> <S%H8794><s%>.

And Aharon <S%H175><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, Alas <S%H994><s%>, my lord <S%H113><s%>, I beseech thee, lay <S%H7896><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not the sin <S%H2403><s%> upon us, wherein we have done foolishly <S%H2973><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, and wherein we have sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

Let her not be as one dead <S%H4994><s%> <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8801><s%>, of whom the flesh <S%H1320><s%> is half <S%H2677><s%> consumed <S%H398><s%> <S%H8735><s%> when he cometh out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of his mother's <S%H517><s%> womb <S%H7358><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> cried <S%H6817><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Heal <S%H7495><s%> <S%H8798><s%> her now, O 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>, I beseech thee.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, If her father <S%H1><s%> had but <S%H3417><s%> <S%H8800><s%> spit <S%H3417><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in her face <S%H6440><s%>, should she not be ashamed <S%H3637><s%> <S%H8735><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>? let her be shut <S%H5462><s%> <S%H8735><s%> out <S%H2351><s%> from the camp <S%H4264><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, and after <S%H310><s%> that let her be received <S%H622><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in again.

And Miryam <S%H4813><s%> was shut <S%H5462><s%> <S%H8735><s%> out <S%H2351><s%> from the camp <S%H4264><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>: and the people <S%H5971><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not till Miryam <S%H4813><s%> was brought <S%H622><s%> <S%H8736><s%> in again.

And afterward <S%H310><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> removed <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from Hazeroth <S%H2698><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Paran <S%H6290><s%>.
